name: df-bj-sngl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wceq(bj-csngl(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
comment: Definition of "singletonization". The class ` sngl A ` is isomorphic to ` A ` and since it contains only singletons, it can be easily be adjoined disjoint elements, which can be useful in various constructions. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
